changeSet.author: ilapa
changeSet.sql: CREATE EXTERNAL WEB TABLE ggexporter.gp_segment_disk_usage ( dfsegment int, dfhostname text, dffilesystem text, dftotal_kb bigint, dfused_kb bigint, dfavail_kb bigint, dfpercent int) EXECUTE 'df -Pk "$GP_SEG_DATADIR" | awk -v seg="$GP_SEGMENT_ID" -v host="$(hostname)" ''NR==2 { gsub("%", "", $5); printf "%s,%s,%s,%s,%s,%s,%s\n", seg, host, $1, $2, $3, $4, $5 }''' ON ALL FORMAT 'CSV' (DELIMITER ',');
